titles.title: Windstorm Hazard Reduction Plan Act of 1993
To require the Director of the Federal Emergency Management Agency to develop a plan and submit a report to the Congress regarding establishing a national windstorm insurance program.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR H363-364)
Referred to the House Committee on Banking, Finance + Urban Affrs.
Referred to the House Committee on Public Works + Transportation.

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Water Resources and Environment.

House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs
House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs

bill.summary: 2/3/1993--Introduced. Windstorm Hazard Reduction Plan Act of 1993 - Directs the Director of the Federal Emergency Management Agency to: (1) develop a plan for establishing and carrying out a national windstorm insurance program; and (2) submit it along with other specified information to specified congressional committees.
